name: Spider Escape!
description:
My first game, created for the VimJam 3 game jam.

Armed with only your multi-use can of hairspray, you must avoid the spiders and escape the cave. Hairspray attack slows the spiders, and flame attack kills the spiders.

CAUTION: you can get hurt if you touch a flaming spider!!

Controls

Movement:Hairspray Attack:Flame Attack:WASD / Arrow KeysLeft Mouse Button
Right Mouse Button
